org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.aggregate

クラス ValueAggregatorCombiner<K1 extends WritableComparable<?>,V1 extends Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer<Text,Text,Text,Text>
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.aggregate.ValueAggregatorCombiner<K1,V1>

  • @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public class ValueAggregatorCombiner<K1 extends WritableComparable<?>,V1 extends Writable>
extends Reducer<Text,Text,Text,Text>
    This class implements the generic combiner of Aggregate.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • reduce

        public void reduce(Text key,
          Iterable<Text> values,
          org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer.Context context)
            throws IOException,
                   InterruptedException
        Combines values for a given key.
        オーバーライド:
        reduce クラス内 Reducer<Text,Text,Text,Text>
        パラメータ:
        key - the key is expected to be a Text object, whose prefix indicates the type of aggregation to aggregate the values.
        values - the values to combine
        context - to collect combined values
        例外:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
